meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: She considerably improved her grades after studying hard.
meanings.sent2: The price of the house decreased considerably after negotiations.
meanings.sent3: The cat considerably stretched before taking a nap.
meanings.sent4: His patience considerably shrank as the meeting dragged on.
meanings.sent5: The storm considerably damaged the old barn with its strong winds.

meanings.definition: To a noteworthy or significant extent
meanings.sent1: The company considerably expanded its operations to new markets.
meanings.sent2: The traffic jam considerably delayed our arrival at the party.
meanings.sent3: The comedian considerably exaggerated the size of the fish he caught.
meanings.sent4: Her smile considerably brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread considerably enhanced the atmosphere of the bakery.
